articles.author: FRANCE 24
articles.title: 'Kind of a black swan event': SpaceX set for record-breaking stock market debut - France 24
articles.description: Billionaire and tech guru Elon Musk plans to take SpaceX public more than two decades after its creation. The move, coming amid a boom in the space industry, could raise more than $30 billion and value the company at up to $1.5 trillion, marking what analysts…
articles.content:
More than 20 years after founding SpaceX, the record-breaking company that transformed the global space industry, Elon Musk is planning to take the enterprise public.

articles.author: Benj Edwards
articles.title: How OpenAI is using GPT-5 Codex to improve the AI tool itself - Ars Technica
articles.description: “The vast majority of Codex is built by Codex,” OpenAI told us about its new AI coding agent.

articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: With iOS 26.2, Apple lets you roll back Liquid Glass again — this time on the Lock Screen - TechCrunch
articles.description: Your iPhone clock doesn't have to be so "glassy" anymore, thanks to a new Apple software update.
articles.content: Apple is releasing another tool to dial down Liquid Glass’ transparency with its release of iOS 26.2, out now. With the update, users will be able to control the transparency of the Lock Screen’s clo… [+2860 chars]
